svg.title: Eratosthenes measure of Earth circumference
svg.desc: Illustration of the method Eratosthenes used to calculate the circumference of the Earth by CMG Lee. The map and globe are derived from http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Egypt_sat.png and http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Earth_orthographic_projection_Earthmap1000x500.jpg , respectively.
